text: Dr Quan is very professional and explains the diagnosis and treatment clearly. The staffs are also very friendly and helpful throughout the process. I had a much better experience here compared to my previous endoscopy clinic.

I have been a patient of Dr. Quan for my IBS.  One of the standout qualities of Dr. Quan is his willingness to truly listen to his patient. He will actively engage in a dialogue with us, ensuring that you not only understand the medical jargon but also help to craft out a treatment plan for me.

I encountered various professionals during my struggle to normalize my life. What sets Dr. Quan apart is his exceptional patience. He does not rush through appointments; instead, he takes time to listen, advise and explain every aspect of the medical journey. Dr. Quan does not just prescribe treatments, he ensures you understand the necessity behind each recommendation, allows you to make decisions about your health within the constraints of your budget.

While the diagnosis of IBS can be a time-consuming process, the assurance and confidence I feel with Dr. Quan make my journey more manageable. If you are seeking a doctor who combines expertise with patience, understanding and commitment, Dr. Quan is undoubtedly a commendable choice.

I recently had a colonoscopy & gastroscopy with Dr. Quan and wanted to share a very positive experience. Dr. Quan took the time to explain the procedure thoroughly beforehand, answering all my questions patiently. Their explanations were clear and reassuring. The entire procedure went smoothly. The staff was kind and attentive, making sure I was comfortable throughout.

Overall, this was a much more positive experience than I anticipated. If you're looking for a gastroenterologist who is knowledgeable, professional, and makes a colonoscopy as pleasant as possible, I highly recommend Dr. Quan.
Dr Quan is very knowledgeable and detailed during the consultation. Heâ€™s really friendly and approachable, had a good session understanding more from him and felt assured.

Dr Quan is a very friendly doctor always willing to listen to all your concerns. Very experienced, professional and up to date with all the latest developments in medicine. If you like doctors who give you their time, discuss your condition by carefully evaluating and explaining all the details, this is the doctor to go to.  I have consulted with many doctors in Singapore and I can easily say that Dr Quan is one of the best. Highly recommended!
